projects.title: Ecommerce & Admin Dashboard
projects.description: By leveraging the power of Next.js, NextAuth, Tailwind CSS, and Express.js, I created a dynamic and modern web application that aims to solve real-world problems and provide an exceptional user experience.

projects.title: Ecommerce

projects.title: Movie, Tv Series Directory
